page.title: 17New Housing...Marchwood
page.content: Marchwood has three{new housing {estates}.Some are still growing in size.They provide housing for all sorts of people,from first time buyers to families with several children.Many of the occupiers do not live in Marchwood, but in Totton or Southampton.The number of houses in Marchwood has doubled during the last 15 years. The houses vary from one bedroomed flats to 4 bedroomed houses which can cost nearly Â£60,000.Most of the houses are detached.In one type of three bedroomed house, there is a built in garage,a lounge leading to a dining room and a well eqipped kitchen. The estates are attractively laid out.The roads are curved,and there are turning spaces for cars.
